ComicInfo.Title: Mega-City Zero: Part One: Terms of Service
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Mega-City Zero,” part 1! Ushering in a brave new era, Judge Dredd awakens to find that Mega-City One has been sent back to the Stone Age, with city blocks overgrown and nary a citizen to be found. Witness as Dredd struggles to unravel the mystery as he copes with being just an ordinary Joe...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ulises Farinas & Ryan Hill | 1 | Sub | Archie Subscription Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | Sub | Blank Subscription Cover | None | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Paul Hanley & Simon Gough | 4-6 | RE | Comic Block Exclusive Variant Cover | Max Dunbar & Joana Lafuente | 7 |
